name: FameBit, Inc.
description: Operator of a marketplace for businesses to find, hire and work with YouTube influencers for product and service endorsements. The company streamlines the whole process from connection to video delivery by providing self-serve tools that allow businesses to deploy YouTube marketing campaigns for product endorsement such as product reviews, tutorials and hauls.
one_liner: Operator of a marketplace for businesses to find, hire and work with YouTube influencers for product and service endorsements.
